body: @zombieadd reply: Yeah, I know that this is NTR, kinda enjoyed it even. My reaction is that I got confused on everything (mainly because it does not have an english translation) I thought it was one whole story. But I guess it turned out to be different stories. Had a bit of a hard time understanding it
I like pregnant doujin so much and this art so cool
Go listen to modern Nazi propaganda, and maybe that's more bearable.

This is not one story it is separate one shots dammit, where is the anthology or compilation tag? Why is this site recently uploading things with missing tags so much now? ( I assume cause it's just ripped from other sites -_- )

@below: Wdym "what in the actual fuck?" Dude this is a netorare doujin manga so this shouldn't come as a surprise (tags). I think the art is great so don't be bothered by the story if you can't handle it.
